title: UPDATE: Woman missing from Shadow Valley care facility found Saturday afternoon
content: UPDATE : Police reported the missing woman was found well at about 2:30 p.m. Saturday.     Ogden Police need the public’s help finding a missing person who wandered from her care facility Saturday morning, June 2.    JoAnne Robinson, 87, was last seen between 8:30 a.m. and 9 a.m. and may have wandered off during breakfast.    Police are currently investigating. They didn’t provide the name of the care facility where Robinson is staying, but said it’s located in Shadow Valley.    Robinson might be wearing a bright green jacket.    Ogden Police ask the public to call 801-395-8221 if the woman is located.
